column4: My guide asks me to install some ... modules and then edit xorg.conf, to change and add some values
And it doesn't let me save them
are you following the instructions on the wiki?
take a look at that page on the wiki
'nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf'  -- shouldn't be too hard to use
the web you gave me is for installing ati official drivers, isn't it?
well, for installing ubuntu-packaged ati drivers
